description: see http://hl7.org/fhir/json.html#schema for information about the FHIR Json Schemas

allOf.description: A search parameter that defines a named search item that can be used to search/filter on a resource.

url.description: An absolute URL that is used to identify this search parameter when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this search parameter is (or will be) published.

name.description: A free text natural language name identifying the search parameter.

status.description: The status of this search parameter definition.

experimental.description: A flag to indicate that this search parameter definition is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

date.description: The date  (and optionally time) when the search parameter definition was published. The date must change when the business version changes, if it does, and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the search parameter changes.

publisher.description: The name of the individual or organization that published the search parameter.

contact.description: Contacts to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

useContext.description: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching of search parameters.

requirements.description: The Scope and Usage that this search parameter was created to meet.

code.description: The code used in the URL or the parameter name in a parameters resource for this search parameter.

base.description: The base resource type that this search parameter refers to.

type.description: The type of value a search parameter refers to, and how the content is interpreted.

description.description: A description of the search parameters and how it used.

expression.description: A FluentPath expression that returns a set of elements for the search parameter.

xpath.description: An XPath expression that returns a set of elements for the search parameter.

xpathUsage.description: How the search parameter relates to the set of elements returned by evaluating the xpath query.

target.description: Types of resource (if a resource is referenced).

allOf.description: A search parameter that defines a named search item that can be used to search/filter on a resource.

name.description: The name of an individual to contact regarding the search parameter.

telecom.description: Contact details for individual (if a name was provided) or the publisher.
